vlive.korean: [촬영 당시 추운 겨울] 겨울철이잖아요? It's the winter time, right? 듣기 View video ITZY : ITZY(있지) IT'z TOURBOOK in USA EP10
겨울에는 비 안 와? Doesn't it rain in winter? 듣기 View video NCT : 🐭🐬잠깐
아니 겨울에 눈 안 오고 비만 와 많이! No, it can just be rainy instead of snowy in winter! 듣기 View video NCT : 🐭🐬잠깐
vlive.english: No, it can just be rainy instead of snowy in winter!

vlive.korean: 야 비 와도 눈이 안 올 수도 있어 겨울에 - 진짜? It can be rainy instead of snowy in winter. - Really? 듣기 View video NCT : 🐭🐬잠깐
vlive.english: It can be rainy instead of snowy in winter. - Really?

vlive.korean: 겨울에... 아악! This winter, argh! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [THE BOYZ] 치즈 콜렉터 째짜니 모짜렐라 치즈로 돌돌말아 둥가둥가 해버려🧀 (NEW eating cheese tteokbokki set)

examples.korean: He spends all winter on the slopes. 발음듣기 그는 겨울 내내 스키장에서 산다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He spends all winter on the slopes. 발음

examples.korean: Birds feed on nuts and berries in the winter. 발음듣기 새들이 겨울에는 견과류와 산딸기류를 먹고 산다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Birds feed on nuts and berries in the winter. 발음

examples.korean: People suffered many hardships during that long winter. 발음듣기 사람들은 그 긴 겨울 동안 많은 곤란을 겪었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: People suffered many hardships during that long winter. 발음

examples.korean: During the winter the seeds lie dormant in the soil. 발음듣기 겨울 동안에는 씨앗들이 성장을 하지 않고 흙 속에 그대로 있는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: During the winter the seeds lie dormant in the soil. 발음

examples.korean: We get heavy fogs on this coast in winter. 발음듣기 겨울에는 이쪽 해안에 안개가 많이 낀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We get heavy fogs on this coast in winter. 발음
